div.pre: 1736 Barda environs, c. 235 km. E of Baku (in anc. Armenia), Azerbaidzhan, 1929 Burial: 139-129 B.C. (M) Contents: 6+ AR Alexander III: 1 tetradr. Antiochus IV: 1 tetradr. Antiochus V: 1 tetradr. Demetrius I: 1 tetradr. Antiochus VII: 2 tetradr. Disposition: Baku â€ Pakhomov II, no. 314 Zograph, "Nakhodky," nos. 67, 73
